bibl.title: "Tropoi" (Posidippus AB 102-103).
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: OBBINK, Dirk

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. xv, 24-xvi, 17 = 102-109 Austin-Bastianini.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 292-301, 1 tabl.
